definition: Qin dynasty (221-207 BC), founded by the first emperor Qin Shihuang 秦始皇[Qin2 Shi3 huang2], the first dynasty to rule the whole of China
surname Qin/Qin dynasty (221-207 BC) of the first emperor 秦始皇[Qin2 Shi3 huang2]/abbr. for 陝西|陕西[Shan3 xi1]
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: The mausoleum was built in imitation of the Qin Dynasty's capital, Xianyang.
sentences.chinese: 這陵園是仿照秦代都城咸陽建造的。

sentences.english: Dok text of the main contents of the legal order is the Qin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 牘文的主要內容，也是秦代法律令。

sentences.english: The Qin Shihuang Mausoleum embodies the greatest cultural achievements of the Qin dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 秦始皇陵集中了秦代文明的最高成就。

sentences.english: Qin Dynasty Stele with bamboo slips on the calligraphy reflected the characteristic of nobility and civilian.
sentences.chinese: 秦代刻石與簡牘上的書法分別反映了貴族與平民書風。

sentences.english: The tombs from the late Warring States period to Qin dynasty are the main content of the dissertation.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要討論江陵地區戰國晚期至秦代的墓葬資料。

sentences.english: The achievement of Song (Sacrificial Songs) of the Qing dynasty is represented by Lis's seven pieces of Stone inscription.
sentences.chinese: 秦代頌體文學成就體現在李斯七篇刻石文上。

sentences.english: This marks the beginning of the Qin dynasty decline.
The city's history can be traced back to Qin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 這個城市的歷史可以追朔到秦代。

sentences.english: The author is a descendant of Confucius Zisi, after modification by the Qin Dynasty scholar finishing.
sentences.chinese: 作者爲孔子後裔子思，後經秦代學者修改整理。

definition: Western Han Dynasty (206 BC-8 AD), also called 前漢|前汉[Qian2 Han4], Former Han Dynasty
pre-Qin, Chinese history up to the foundation of the Qin imperial dynasty in 221 BC
Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)/refers to the Western Han and Eastern Han
the Spring and Autumn (770-476 BC) and Warring States (475-221 BC) periods
the Qin (221-207 BC) and Han (206 BC-220 AD) dynasties
Qin Shihuang (259-210 BC), the first emperor
the Spring and Autumn (770-476 BC) and Warring States (475-221 BC) periods/Eastern Zhou (770-221 BC)
pinyin: Chun1 qiu1 Zhan4 guo2 Shi2 dai4

definition: the prehistoric Shang dynasty (c. 16th-11th century BC)
